languages.text: "Большой и загадочный человек в Миссии. Он приставлен Касбалликой надзирать, чтобы дела велись не слишком вольно и об интересах старших партнеров не забывали. Когда о них забывают — приходит Пощада, кто-нибудь умирает, у всех становится бледный вид и резко пустеют карманы".

"Some big mysterious figure in the Mission. The Kasballica's put him here to keep a handle on things and to make sure the interests of the senior partners aren't forgotten. If anyone does become a bit forgetful, Mercy comes along, somebody dies, everyone else panics and empties their pockets."
languages.original_text: "Большой и загадочный человек в Миссии. Он приставлен Касбалликой надзирать, чтобы дела велись не слишком вольно и об интересах старших партнеров не забывали. Когда о них забывают — приходит Пощада, кто-нибудь умирает, у всех становится бледный вид и резко пустеют карманы".

traits.locale_text: "Some big mysterious figure in the Mission. The Kasballica's put him here to keep a handle on things and to make sure the interests of the senior partners aren't forgotten. If anyone does become a bit forgetful, Mercy comes alone, somebody dies, everyone else panics and empties their pockets."

"Some big mysterious figure in the Mission. The Kasballica's put him here to keep a handle on things and to make sure the interests of the senior partners aren't forgotten. If anyone does become a bit forgetful, Mercy comes alone, somebody dies, everyone else panics and empties their pockets."

"Some big mysterious figure in the Mission. The Kasballica's put him here to keep a handle on things and to make sure the interests of the senior partners aren't forgotten. If anyone does become a bit forgetful, Mercy comes alone, somebody dies, everyone else panics and empties their pockets."

"Some big mysterious figure in the Mission. The Kasballica's put him here to keep a handle on things and to make sure the interests of the senior partners aren't forgotten. If anyone does become a bit forgetful, Mercy comes along, somebody dies, everyone else panics and empties their pockets."

languages.text: “是犯罪集团里的某个大人物。卡斯巴利卡派他来这里控制局面，确保不会有人忘记那些高级合伙人的利益。如果有谁记性不太好的话，悯慈就会亲自出面，之后就会有人掉脑袋，剩下的人吓得惊慌失措，把口袋里的东西全掏出来。”
languages.original_text: "Some big mysterious figure in the Mission. The Kasballica's put him here to keep a handle on things and to make sure the interests of the senior partners aren't forgotten. If anyone does become a bit forgetful, Mercy comes along, somebody dies, everyone else panics and empties their pockets."

traits.locale_text: “是犯罪集团里的某个大人物。卡斯巴利卡派他来这里控制局面，确保不会有人忘记那些高级合伙人的利益。如果有谁记性不太好的话，悯慈就会亲自出面，之后就会有人掉脑袋，剩下的人吓得惊慌失措，把口袋里的东西全掏出来。”

languages.text: 「聖務団の謎めいた大物ですよ。カスバリカが彼をここに寄越したのは、物事を管理し、シニアパートナーの利益が忘れ去られないようにするためですよ。誰かが恩を忘れるようなことがあれば、マーシーがやってきて、死人が出て、皆が大混乱に陥り、そのポケットも空っぽになるというわけです」
languages.original_text: "Some big mysterious figure in the Mission. The Kasballica's put him here to keep a handle on things and to make sure the interests of the senior partners aren't forgotten. If anyone does become a bit forgetful, Mercy comes along, somebody dies, everyone else panics and empties their pockets."

traits.locale_text: 「聖務団の謎めいた大物ですよ。カスバリカが彼をここに寄越したのは、物事を管理し、シニアパートナーの利益が忘れ去られないようにするためですよ。誰かが恩を忘れるようなことがあれば、マーシーがやってきて、死人が出て、皆が大混乱に陥り、そのポケットも空っぽになるというわけです」

languages.text: «Una figura importante y misteriosa de la misión. La Kasballica le ha enviado aquí para tener controlada la situación y asegurarse de que a nadie se le olvidan los intereses de los socios principales. Si alguien se despista, Mercy acude, alguien muere y a los demás les entra el pánico y vacían la cartera».
languages.original_text: "Some big mysterious figure in the Mission. The Kasballica's put him here to keep a handle on things and to make sure the interests of the senior partners aren't forgotten. If anyone does become a bit forgetful, Mercy comes along, somebody dies, everyone else panics and empties their pockets."

traits.locale_text: «Una figura importante y misteriosa de la misión. La Kasballica le ha enviado aquí para tener controlada la situación y asegurarse de que a nadie se le olvidan los intereses de los socios principales. Si alguien se despista, Mercy acude, alguien muere y a los demás les entra el pánico y vacían la cartera».

languages.text: « Un personnage mystérieux de la Mission. La Kasballica l'a envoyé régler les problèmes et veiller à ce que les intérêts des principaux associés ne soient pas mis de côté. Si quiconque a le malheur d'être un peu trop tête en l'air, Mercy arrive, quelqu'un meurt, et tous les autres paniquent et vident leurs poches. »
languages.original_text: "Some big mysterious figure in the Mission. The Kasballica's put him here to keep a handle on things and to make sure the interests of the senior partners aren't forgotten. If anyone does become a bit forgetful, Mercy comes along, somebody dies, everyone else panics and empties their pockets."

traits.locale_text: « Un personnage mystérieux de la Mission. La Kasballica l'a envoyé régler les problèmes et veiller à ce que les intérêts des principaux associés ne soient pas mis de côté. Si quiconque a le malheur d'être un peu trop tête en l'air, Mercy arrive, quelqu'un meurt, et tous les autres paniquent et vident leurs poches. »

languages.text: "Irgendeine mysteriöse Gestalt aus der Mission. Die Kasballica hat ihn entsandt, um die Situation hier unter Kontrolle zu halten und sicherzustellen, dass die Interessen ihrer Geschäftspartner berücksichtigt werden. Denn falls das jemand vergisst, kommt Mercy allein, jemand stirbt und alle anderen geraten in Panik und leeren ihre Taschen."
languages.original_text: "Some big mysterious figure in the Mission. The Kasballica's put him here to keep a handle on things and to make sure the interests of the senior partners aren't forgotten. If anyone does become a bit forgetful, Mercy comes along, somebody dies, everyone else panics and empties their pockets."

traits.locale_text: "Irgendeine mysteriöse Gestalt aus der Mission. Die Kasballica hat ihn entsandt, um die Situation hier unter Kontrolle zu halten und sicherzustellen, dass die Interessen ihrer Geschäftspartner berücksichtigt werden. Denn falls das jemand vergisst, kommt Mercy allein, jemand stirbt und alle anderen geraten in Panik und leeren ihre Taschen."

languages.text: "Misyon'daki önemli ve gizemli bir şahıs. Kasballica onu buraya işleri düzene soksun ve kodamanların çıkarları unutulmasın diye yolladı. Birilerinin unutkanlığı tutacak olursa Merhamet devreye girer, birileri ölür, diğerleri de panikler ve ceplerini boşaltır."
languages.original_text: "Some big mysterious figure in the Mission. The Kasballica's put him here to keep a handle on things and to make sure the interests of the senior partners aren't forgotten. If anyone does become a bit forgetful, Mercy comes along, somebody dies, everyone else panics and empties their pockets."

traits.locale_text: "Misyon'daki önemli ve gizemli bir şahıs. Kasballica onu buraya işleri düzene soksun ve kodamanların çıkarları unutulmasın diye koydu. Birilerinin unutkanlığı tutacak olursa Merhamet devreye girer, birileri ölür, diğerleri de panikler ve ceplerini boşaltırlar."
